description:
The Untold Story of the AI Patent War: a Trillion-Dollar Mistake?
"In the high-stakes arena of artificial intelligence, one misstep can reshape the future."

Imagine a world where a single patent decision determined the fate of the AI landscape. This is the story of Google's Transformer patent and the loophole that may have allowed OpenAI to rise to dominance. Was it a colossal blunder, or a strategic necessity? ğŸ˜²
